org.flexiblepower.messaging

Annotation Type Ports


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Ports
    When defining more that one Port on and Endpoint, this annotation can be used to group them. It is not possible in Java to define multiple Port annotations on the same object.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Port[] value
      The specified Ports on the Endpoint.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract Port[] value
        The specified Ports on the Endpoint.
